name: Bit Decay
description: Interactive. Drag your mouse or finger across the screen. "Open controls" in the top-right corner to customise your experience. Bit Decay rewards patience and experimentation /// This has the ability to generate quite a bit of visual noise/flickers, so start slow if you're sensitive to motion or lights (but everything is under your control) /// There's a little "?" in the top-right you can click for help /// This software is presented "as is". Minted by Robin on 30th April 2021
